name: Sadat Jalali
personality: Introverted, thoughtful and analytical, with a strong sense of duty and loyalty to his country
story: Abdul-Qadir was born in a small village in the mountains of Iran. His father was a farmer and his mother a homemaker. As a child, he was always fascinated by the stories his grandfather told about the Iran-Iraq war and the bravery of the soldiers who fought in it. This inspired Abdul-Qadir to join the military when he was old enough, and he underwent rigorous training to become a marksmanship expert. He was eventually recruited by the elite OPFOR unit and has since completed numerous successful missions as a recon marksman. Despite the dangers of his job, Abdul-Qadir remains committed to serving his country and making his family proud.
